name: Apple
description: Apple is stocked here with much care. Our Expert team try to store the fruits in that way where customers can get the good quality.

name: Mango
description: As a perishable fruit mango is preserved very carefully and with latest technology to get original taste and quality.

name: Jack Fruit
description: Jack Fruit is the fruit of summer. It is also perishable fruit. So, we stored jackfruit in a cold place to keep fresh. Technology helps a lot here.

name: Orange
description: Orange is grown in hilly area. So, we stored orange in a cold place as like hilly area environment to get real taste and quality.
